hero.title: Transform your <marketing>marketing</marketing> into results
hero.subtitle: The trusted marketing platform for companies that want to grow. Hire our services, work with us or build your passive income.

home.threeWays: Three ways to work with Alchemy
home.forClientsDesc: Hire high-quality marketing services. Traffic management, content creation and complete strategy.
home.forEditorsDesc: Join our team. Work on amazing projects, receive fast payments and have complete support.
home.passiveIncomeDesc: Build a passive income source. Recurring earnings, financial freedom and continuous growth.

client.trafficManagementDesc: We optimize your ads to maximize ROI. Complete campaign management on Google Ads, Meta Ads and more.
client.contentCreationDesc: Content that converts. Videos, posts, reels and much more created by our team of specialized editors.
client.completeStrategyDesc: Personalized strategic planning. Market analysis, persona definition and complete roadmap.

editor.completeSupportDesc: Have access to resources, templates and team support. Grow as an editor working with professionals.

passiveIncome.title: Build your <passiveIncome>Passive Income</passiveIncome>
passiveIncome.subtitle: Work with us and build a passive income source. Earn while you sleep.
passiveIncome.recurringEarningsDesc: Receive monthly recurring payments working with our clients. Stable and predictable income.
passiveIncome.financialFreedomDesc: Work from anywhere, whenever you want. Build your financial freedom with projects that generate passive income.
passiveIncome.continuousGrowthDesc: Increase your income over time. The more you work, the more growth opportunities you have.
passiveIncome.interestedDesc: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you to explain how you can start building your passive income with us.
